message: I have a unique opportunity for you to purchase a high-value item for a fair price. I'm willing to let it go for $10000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway. I can do $9500, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand that you're not willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $9200, and I think that's a fair price for both of us. Would you be willing to consider it?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, but that's as close to your offer as I can get.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $9500, and I think that's the best I can do. Would you be willing to consider it?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $10000, Bob. That's the absolute minimum I'm willing to consider. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
